register.termsAndConditions:
Welcome to our dental clinic booking app.

By using our app, you agree to the following terms:
1. You must provide accurate information when signing up.
2. You can book, reschedule, or cancel appointments through this app.
3. Please cancel at least 24 hours before your appointment.
4. Payments are made at the clinic unless otherwise specified.
5. Be respectful when using the app and interacting with our staff.

Thank you for choosing our dental clinic!
